name: PuckMan Paper Roll
description:
PuckMan Paper Roll

Controls:  Arrow Keys left up and right to make PuckMan move and jump.

Rules: Keep PuckMan in the center zone for as long as you can ! If He hits the top or bottom of the note page he will be destroyed!

*Highscores

*Fun Gameplay

*Handmade Graphics

*(This game was made in under a day by medwards art  for the https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-153 )
